Judul: Design Thinking A View Through the Lens of Practice
Abstrak:
This article is an opportunity for me to reflect upon my experiences of  practicing design thinking and to share those aspects of design thinking that I believe to be of the greatest benefit to successful OD work. 
I will also look beyond the mystique surrounding design thinking and explore the theoretical, practical, and philosophical linkages between OD and Design.
Sumber: OD Practitioner. Fall2015, Vol. 47 Issue 4, p42-47. 6p.
